para.emphasis: JBoss Application Server and Mobicents now features a revamped SNMP Adaptor, leveraging

as a Java implementation of SNMP, that wraps the JMX MBean and Notifications to allow monitoring and configuration of the Application Server and applications deployed on it through the SNMP protocol.Note: the documentation for the previous version can be found here
The Adaptor now supports all versions of the protocol, v1, v2c and v3 including security for v2c and v3. It also has supports for tables and both traps and informs.
